calculations.name: fixed netting 3 R (T-1)
calculations.tableau_expression:
Sum(ABS({FIXED   [RpDate],[Subs],[Counterpty],[Cash curr],[Maturity Date],[R/RR]: 
(
(Sum(IF [Is Forward Start ?] = 0 AND [Is Approved for Netting] = "1" 
AND [Bucket]<>"open"  AND  [R/RR]="R" AND [Title Date Filter (T-1)]=1

THEN ([Ut. US MM]) ELSE 0 END)))}))

calculation_context.Expression:
Sum(ABS({FIXED   [RpDate],[Subs],[Counterpty],[Cash curr],[Maturity Date],[R/RR]: 
(
(Sum(IF [Is Forward Start ?] = 0 AND [Is Approved for Netting] = "1" 
AND [Bucket]<>"open"  AND  [R/RR]="R" AND [Title Date Filter (T-1)]=1

THEN ([Ut. US MM]) ELSE 0 END)))}))

calculated_fields.Title Date Filter (T-1):
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    (if [MAX_DATE -1day]= [RpDate] then 1 else 0 END)
else if [RpDate]= [End DATE - 1day] then 1 else 0 END END
calculated_fields.MAX_DATE -1day:
case datepart('weekday',[Max Date])
when 1 then [Max Date]-2
when 2 then [Max Date]-3
else [Max Date]-1
end
calculated_fields.End DATE - 1day:
case datepart('weekday',[Parameters].[End Date])
when 1 then [Parameters].[End Date]-2
when 2 then [Parameters].[End Date]-3
else [Parameters].[End Date]-1
end
calculated_fields.Max Date:
case datepart('weekday',today())
    when 1 then today()-2
    when 2 then today()-3
    else today()-1
    END
